SELECT D.DEBATE_ID, D.MEETING_ID, B.TITLE, B.COVER FROM TBL_DEBATE D JOIN TBL_MEMBER_DEBATE MD ON D.DEBATE_ID = MD.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_ID =#{memberId} AND MD.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_DEBATE_BOOK DB ON D.DEBATE_ID = DB.DEBATE_ID AND DB.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON B.ISBN13 = DB.ISBN13
WHERE TO_CHAR(DEBATE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY DEBATE_ID ASC
